definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Research indicated that the modified rules presented higher demand in Athletic skills.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，新規則提高了對田徑運動技術的難度要求。

sentences.english: Rule of Frack and Field Competition is the concomitant of Frack and Field Sports.
sentences.chinese: 田徑競賽規則是田徑運動的伴生物。

sentences.english: Yingying represents the yellow ring and the athletics sports.
sentences.chinese: 迎迎代表黃環和田徑運動。

sentences.english: Track and field sports have dual features of competition and body building.
sentences.chinese: 田徑運動具有競技性和健身性雙重屬性。

sentences.english: I had my best track season after being vegan for almost a year.
sentences.chinese: 在嚴格喫全素之後，我的田徑運動達到最好的狀況。

sentences.english: Their players cleaned up in all the track-and-field events.
sentences.chinese: 他們的運動員囊括田徑運動賽的全部錦標。

sentences.english: This college has a long tradition of athletic excellence.
sentences.chinese: 這所大學在田徑運動方面歷來成績驕人。

sentences.english: Like all antelopes, he is strong in track and field events.
sentences.chinese: 和其他藏羚羊一樣，他擅長田徑運動。
